thread.title: 'Grey's Anatomy' Cast Member to Leave This Year (Spoilers)
thread.title_full: 'Grey's Anatomy' Cast Member to Leave This Year (Spoilers)

author: Just Jared
title: 'Grey's Anatomy' Cast Member to Leave This Year (Spoilers)
text:
Someone is reportedly set to leave Grey’s Anatomy at the end of the current season and it’s sure to upset some viewers!
The show has net yet been renewed for an upcoming 14th season, but with the strong ratings that the Shonda Rhimes series receives, another season is pretty much a sure thing.
Click inside for the spoilers on who is set to leave the series… 
If you don’t want to know who is leaving the series, you should click away now before reading any spoilers!
Last warning!!!
Jerrika Hinton – Dr. Stephanie Edwards Jerrika Hinton , who plays the role of Dr. Stephanie Edwards, will leave the show at the end of the season, according to TV Line .
It’s not yet known how Jerrika ‘s exit from the show will be handled in the storyline. There’s always a chance that she can return as a guest star if they leave it off in the right way.
